name: SocialMedia UIKIT Demo
description:
We prepared a social media ui kit with the best interface designed. Create modern pages in minutes from a library of 72 responsive layouts. Generate a unique look with a powerful, full web design system. We made a high quality, responsive components for a faster process. You can start a new project with a variety of layouts in light and dark mode for each section. 


What will you get: 

Clear and simple structure of 72 mock-ups in 2 styles 

Easy customization with Figma components 

Vector based 

Dark and light versions 

Well organized layers and groups 

Every component is pixel perfect
